entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 9:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then partly cloudy. Rain mixed with freezing rain early this evening. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
